name: ProBook 15 Laptop
description: 15.6-inch business laptop with Intel i7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD. Perfect for professionals.

name: UltraSlim 14 Laptop
description: Lightweight 14-inch ultrabook with AMD Ryzen 7, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD. Under 3 pounds.

name: MechStrike Pro Mechanical Keyboard
description: Full-size mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX Brown switches, RGB backlighting, aluminum frame.

name: MechStrike Mini 65% Keyboard
description: Compact 65% mechanical keyboard with hot-swappable switches and wireless connectivity.

name: PrecisionGlide Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with 25,600 DPI optical sensor, 70-hour battery life.

name: PrecisionGlide Ultra Light Gaming Mouse
description: Ultra-lightweight gaming mouse at 58g with paracord cable and PTFE feet.

name: ClearView 27" 4K Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K IPS monitor with USB-C PD, 100% sRGB, height-adjustable stand.

name: ClearView 32" Curved Gaming Monitor
description: 32-inch curved QHD gaming monitor with 165Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time.

name: SoundStage Pro Wireless Headphones
description: Over-ear wireless headphones with ANC, 40-hour battery, Hi-Res Audio certified.

name: SoundStage Buds ANC Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with ANC, 8-hour battery, IPX5 water resistance.

name: USB-C Docking Station Pro
description: 13-in-1 USB-C docking station with dual 4K display support, 100W PD passthrough.

specs.ports: 3x USB-A, 2x USB-C, 2x HDMI, DP, Ethernet, SD, Audio

name: Thunderbolt 4 Cable 2m
description: Certified Thunderbolt 4 cable, 40Gbps data, 100W PD, 8K video support.

name: WebCam 4K Pro
description: 4K webcam with auto-framing, built-in ring light, noise-cancelling microphone.

name: NVMe External SSD 2TB
description: Portable NVMe SSD with 2000MB/s read speeds, IP67 rated, bus powered.

name: GamerBook 16 Gaming Laptop
description: 16-inch gaming laptop with RTX 4070, Intel i9, 32GB RAM, 240Hz display.

name: ErgoWave Split Keyboard
description: Ergonomic split mechanical keyboard with tenting, wrist rests, and Kailh Box switches.

name: TrackMaster Ergonomic Trackball
description: Wireless trackball mouse with thumb ball, 5 programmable buttons, ergonomic design.

name: ClearView 24" FHD Monitor
description: Budget-friendly 24-inch Full HD monitor with slim bezels and VESA mount.

name: PowerStation 140W GaN Charger
description: 4-port GaN charger with 140W total output, foldable prongs, travel-friendly.

name: SoundStage Desk Speaker Pair
description: USB-powered desktop speakers with Bluetooth, 20W total output, wood grain finish.
